biotools.summary: emDNA is a C++ software for minimizing the energy of DNA or DNA+proteins complexes. It can handle various geometrical constraints (e.g. fixed end-to-end distance and/or rotation) and can be used to simulate opened or closed DNA fragments.

bioschemas.name: emDNA
bioschemas.summary: emDNA is a C++ software for minimizing the energy of DNA or DNA+proteins complexes. It can handle various geometrical constraints (e.g. fixed end-to-end distance and/or rotation) and can be used to simulate opened or closed DNA fragments.
